on reading compounds: 捨身【シャシン】renouncing the flesh or the world, becoming a priest, risking one's life for others
取捨【シュシャ】adoption or rejection, selection, choice, option
用捨【ヨウシャ】adoption or rejection, choice, separating the needed from the unneeded
kun reading compounds: 捨てる【すてる】to throw away, to cast away, to dump, to discard, to abandon, to desert, to leave, to give up, to resign
捨てる神あれば拾う神あり【すてるかみあればひろうかみあり】when one door is shut, another is open, the world is as kind as it is cruel
